text: Rodney Lee Davis (born January 5, 1970) is an American Republican politician. He was the U.S. representative for Illinois's 13th congressional district from 2013 to 2023. In 2022, he lost re-nomination to U.S. Representative Mary Miller. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Illinois Category:Politicians from Des Moines, Iowa Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Rodney Davis (politician)
